events.title: Spring Semester Begins
events.description: First day of classes for Spring 2024 semester. All students should check their course schedules and classroom locations.

events.title: Add/Drop Deadline
events.description: Last day to add or drop courses without penalty. Students must finalize their course schedules by 11:59 PM.

events.title: Republic Day
events.description: National Holiday - Republic Day of India

events.title: Research Symposium
events.description: Annual undergraduate research symposium. Students will present their research projects and findings.

events.title: Spring Break
events.description: Spring break week. Classes resume March 18th.

events.title: Registration Opens
events.description: Fall 2024 course registration opens for all students. Priority registration for seniors begins at 8:00 AM.

events.title: Academic Conference
events.description: Annual Academic Excellence Conference featuring keynote speakers and student presentations.

events.title: Final Exams
events.description: Final examination period. Check your exam schedule for specific times and locations.

events.title: Commencement Ceremony
events.description: Spring 2024 graduation ceremony. Ceremony begins at 10:00 AM in the main auditorium.

events.title: Summer Session Begins
events.description: First summer session begins. Intensive courses and workshops available.

events.title: Independence Day
events.description: National Holiday - Independence Day of India

events.title: Fall Semester Begins
events.description: First day of classes for Fall 2024 semester. Welcome back students!

events.title: Gandhi Jayanti
events.description: National Holiday - Birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi

events.title: Winter Break
events.description: Winter break period. Classes resume in January.
